flawed_nl_solution:
Mary started with 5 books and returned 3 so she had 5-3 = <<5-3=2>>2 books
She had 2 books and checked out 5 more books so she had 2+5 = <<2+5=5>>5 books
She now has 5 books but returned 2 so she has 5-2 = <<5-2=3>>3 books
She had 3 books and checked out 7 more books so she has 3+7 = <<3+7=10>>10 books checked out
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
